attributes.action: Let people LEARN to drive at 15 years and 9 months with their provisional
attributes.additional_details: If you let 15 year olds drive with there provisional with instructor or parents/legal guardian by the time they are 17 they will have a lot of experience which will help them pass and be more confident and also hopefully be more safe one the roads.
attributes.background: Let 15 years and 9months learn to drive with their provisional license with either instructor or parents/legal guardian but you can only pass your test and drive on your own at 17 like usual.

rejection.details:
We currently have the following petition open on this topic, which you might like to sign:

Change the legal driving age to 15
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640011
